section1.problem: In this sea of competition, how does one stand out? How can I show my personality, skills and experiences in one place in a way my audience would see ambition, passion and potential. Taking into account these accolades, a risk was imminent.
section1.solution: I decided to create a different experience, yet simple, readable, user-friendly and perhaps a sense of familiarity. A Social Media-Styled Portfolio is what I chose to build as the design inspired by Quora.

section2.summary: This page is a progress report for my React Portfolio Project. The design is based on Quora's homepage and profile page, modified in the style of a portfolio.
section2.designRemarks: I have used the Quora color scheme of red, grey and white.
lessonsLearned: Gained a better understanding of React and React Hooks. (not quite there yet)
CSS and Flexbox practised well and is now part of my intuitive design process. (we're halfway there!!)
Very organized and tidy use and creation of React omponents. (with room for improvement)
section2.nextSteps: This project carried forward will consist of portfolios in different interface styles of common web applications, including responsiveness to smaller devices. .
